name: Specification
about: The root specification for the API definition format, providing a base set of rules for all services and tools that employ the spec.

name: Generator
about: Generating an API definition format from an existing system or platform.

name: Parser
about: Parses a machine readable API definition and makes ready for use in specific language, structure, or platform.

name: Validator
about: Validates an API definition against its formal specification and schema, producing a valid or invalid response, with as much detail as possible.

name: Schema
about: Produces a specific schema, from an existing template, in a particular API definition format.

name: Converter
about: The conversion of an API definition from one format into another.

name: Database
about: Tooling that generates an API definition format from a database connection, allowing for API integration with common database formats.

name: Mock
about: Generating a mock interface for an API based upon the definition provided, allowing for testing, and playing with a copy of the API that is not for production.

name: Server
about: The auto generation of server side code from a machine readable API definition.

name: Client
about: The auto generation of client side code from a machine readable API definition format.

name: Single Page Application
about: Generating a single page applicaiton in a specific framework, derieved from an API definition, either as documentation for API, or as functional app interactive with API itself.

name: Command-Line
about: The usage of machine readable API definitions at the command line.

name: Powershell
about: The usage of machine readable API definitions via the powershell interface.

name: Testing
about: Generating, providing, and configuring API testing using machine readable API definition formats.

name: Monitoring
about: Setting up of API monitors to keep track of API operations over scheduled period of time using an API definition format.

name: Proxy
about: Generation and configuration of a proxy from a machine readable API definition.

name: Aggregator
about: Aggregation of APIs using a machine readable API definition format.

name: Editors
about: API definition editor, allowing for the creation, import, and export of API definition formats, providing a simple, IDE like API editing experience.

name: Documentation
about: Generation of static, or JavaScript interactive documentation from the API definition, helping developers understand what an API does.

name: Forms
about: Dynamically generating an HTML form from an API definition, allow for the structure, and handling to be driven by an API definition.

name: Real-Time
about: Establishing a connection with real-time functionality derived from an API definition format, allowing APIs to be connected with other real-time protocols.

name: Visualization
about: Generating a visualization from the meta data, or resources made available via a machine readable API definition.
